body: A shimmering mantle of light shrouds the subject, casting light like a torch. The subject of the spell gains a +1 resistance bonus on all saving throws per four caster levels (maximum +5 at 20th level). The subject can end the wrathful mantle at any time as a swift action to deal 2d8 points of force damage to all creatures within 5 feet.
description: Subject shines and gets +1/four levels on all saves.

effects.text: creature touched or all creatures within 5 ft.; see text

name: Wrathful Mantle
